name: Last Resort (Sejr Thomsen)
description:
Life isn't easy for an android, so Q20-9 takes any jobs that come his way. One day, the older android YO4 gives him a seemingly simple task...

Last Resort is a a short cyberpunk adventure game about bodily autonomy through the eyes of an android. Control Q20-9 as he interacts with the world around him and attempts to make an important decision.

Created by Sejr Thomsen

Special thanks to Benno Lüders, Brenna Asplund and Sebastian Trelles for help with programming, writing and design, respectively.

All sounds from Freesound.org:

Theme & Ending music

Beep 1, beep 2 & scanning sound
